title: Pool party icon
body: WHERE THE HELL IS MY ICON, ITS BEEN A WEEK (i think) AND I HAVENT EVEN GOTTEN IT BUT I HAVE RECEIVED MY MYSTERY CHAMP (I have won a 5v5  at the pool party weekend) RIOT PLEASE I COLLECT THEM ICONS I NEED IT!!

replies.body: Did you get the fizz icon? pretty sure only oce people did, have fun *catchin'em all*

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jy7nqj8E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-05T12:14:16.554+0000)
>
> Did you get the fizz icon? **pretty sure only oce people did**, have fun *catchin'em all*

Uhhh, it was on sale for 250 RP on other regions.....


*Sincerely,*

http://www.auplod.com/u/lpodua564a6.png
Ah it was only 1 ip here ;-;
i got it at the event where 3 icons costed 250 rp and they came from diff servers/ server events

Hey exorsos,

The Pool Party icon distribution is [complete](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3VhOeAbf-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going).

If you think you should have received one but didn't, feel free to submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into it!

Not trying to be rude here, honestly, but I have to ask.

Is there any way else to contact Riot other than through Player Support? Seeing as it takes literally forever to hear back from them.
To guarantee a response, yes.  Some players post on the boards, but that doesn't guarantee they'll receive a response.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jy7nqj8E,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-06T20:53:03.002+0000)
>
> guarantee

More like "GARENtee"!

{{champion:86}} 

######Sorry, I had to. Lol

How often do Riot Employee's check Reddit? The Reddit community is always so quick to help, the last time I had client problems I went to Reddit first and had the problem fixed by the community within 5 minutes.

The longest I've waited is 5 months for an answer (that didn't come, they closed the ticket)
So I would say that is a very real possibility.
I sent a support ticket already please look into it >.>
Are you sure you earned points during the week to get it?
